column2: BRAVO BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. FIRST WOODS ARE CLEARED. OVER.
BRAVO TO PAPA BEAR. SECOND WOODS HAVE BEEN CLEARED. OVER.
BRAVO TO PAPA BEAR. THIRD WOODS IS CLEAR. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS BRAVO BLACK. WE HAVE FINISHED UP HERE, THE WOODS AREA IS CLEAR. OVER.
ROGER THAT BRAVO. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. RETURN TO BASE. OVER.
